name: advanced-notes-app
description: Monorepo for Advanced Notes App (NestJS + React)
author: BaryYur

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w backend && npm run type-check -w frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start -w backend" "npm run start -w frontend"
scripts.format: npm run format -w backend && npm run format -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
